name: MetricCollector
documentation:
Interface for collecting a specific type of metric.

Implementations should be stateless and thread-safe. The {@link #collect()} method may be called concurrently from multiple threads. @param the type of metrics this collector produces

methods.name: collect
isAvailable
methods.documentation:
Checks if this collector is available on the current platform.

This method should return quickly and may cache its result. @return true if this collector can collect metrics on the current platform
